explains: adj. 相当大的，相当重要的；（人）显要的，值得尊敬的

sentences.en: Damage to the building was considerable.
sentences.cn: 对这栋建筑物的损坏相当严重。

sentences.en: She argued her case with considerable passion.
sentences.cn: 她相当激动地为自己的主张提出论据。

sentences.en: The argument seemed to have considerable merit.
sentences.cn: 这个论点似乎有相当大的价值。
